summary: Prevents the player from taking any fall damage.
descriptionHtml:
==============
PsychOK2011s Graceful Lander Perk
By: MofoMojo
==============

==============
Description
==============
This is Mofomojo\'s PsychOK2011s Graceful Lander Perk. Essentially, made at the request of 

 PsychOK2011 on the Nexus forums here:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/544776-no-fall-damage-mod/

Prevents the player from taking any fall damage. 

==============
Features
==============
You should be able to fall from any height without taking damage.


================
Current Version Changes
================
1.0

================
HOW TO INSTALL
================

--------------
==Plugin==
--------------
-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check \"MM_PsychOK2011_Graceful_Lander_Perk\"

---------
==In Game==
---------
You need to get to the console ingame and add the perk to your character. To find it from 

the console, type:

HELP Psycho 4

It should list the Perk along with it\'s entry ID. To add it your character type:

Player.AddPerk <0x########>

---------
==Version History==
---------

1.0 Vaporware
1.1 This time with added bonus of actual mod file!
author: MofoMojo
